title: Swedish mailorder and interior design logo
author: kristinajonsson

comments.content: The t tied to the o and e lead me to believe this has been messed with a whole bunch and is not a font as such.

That would confirm my suspicions since I could not find any similar to it.  
Do you know of any font that is similar to the logo?

Only because of /e and /o (less), I'd probably go with either [Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417112820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) Bold or [Meloriac](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417112820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/meloriac).
If i´m mostly looking for a font where the J has the same look and where the T have the same slope on the top of the letter. Do you have any suggestions?

Kristina, it's not likely that you'll find an unaltered font with that j and angled t (Univers and Arial, for instance, have an angled t, but in the opposite direction).

In addition to Ryuk's very good suggestions, here are a few more fonts that might get you closer:

Tablet Gothic Wide:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/wide-extra-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417112820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/wide-extra-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/wide-extra-bold/")

Corporate S Extra Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-s/extra-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417112820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-s/extra-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-s/extra-bold/")

Kropotkin Standard 42 Expanded Black:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sugargliderz/kropotkin-std/42-expanded-black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417112820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sugargliderz/kropotkin-std/42-expanded-black/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sugargliderz/kropotkin-std/42-expanded-black/")
Thank you for all of your replies. You are all awesome and have been a great help.
